instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALLATION: Run `npm install framer-motion lenis` immediately.
SETUP: Configure `tailwind.config.js` to add the custom colors (obsidian, brand) defined in `design_system.colors`.
FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to `index.css`.
GLOBAL CSS: Set `body { @apply bg-obsidian text-white font-body; }` in `index.css`.
ANIMATION: Wrap the entire app in `<ReactLenis root>` for smooth scrolling.
COMPONENTS: Use `framer-motion` for all entrance animations. Do not use static CSS transitions for page loads.
FORMS: Customize Shadcn Input components to remove the default ring and background. Use `bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-brand rounded-none px-0`.
IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid deep colors or noise textures.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use generic centered layouts without a twist.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
